text: Enoch Adejare Adeboye was born on 2nd of March 1942, He is a Nigerian pastor, General Overseer of Redeemed Christian Church of God in Lagos. Enoch Adejare Adeboye was born to a small village in Ifewara, near Ife, in Osun State, Nigeria. He was born into a very poor family background. Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian Christian clergy Category:People from Osun State
title: Enoch Adeboye
